Shadow Hand Attack.name: Shadow Hand Attack
Shadow Hand Attack.flavor: Your blade is everywhere and nowhere at once, and your enemy dies without knowing what hit it.
Shadow Hand Attack.special: When you make this attack, also roll a Thievery check opposed by the target’s Perception check. If either the opposed check or the attack roll is successful, you hit.
Shadow Hand Attack.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If both the attack roll and the Thievery check succeeded, increase the damage to 4[W] + Dexterity modifier.

Twilight Escape.name: Twilight Escape
Twilight Escape.flavor: The enemy approaches you, but only shadows await its murderous blow. You’re long gone.
Twilight Escape.trigger: When an enemy enters a square adjacent to you

Robed in Shadow.name: Robed in Shadow
Robed in Shadow.flavor: You summon a cloak of velvet shadow to hide you from sight. To your foes, you seem to disappear like a wisp of smoke in the wind.
Robed in Shadow.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you end your turn adjacent to an enemy, you become invisible to that enemy until the start of your next turn.
